data.text: In the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar, when Pontius Pilate was governor of Judea, and Herod was tetrarch of Galilee, and Philip his brother was tetrarch of the region of Ituraea and Trachonitis, and Lysanias was tetrarch of Abilene,
during the 3:2 high priesthood of ¦ time of the high priests TRhigh priesthood of Annas and Caiaphas, the word of God came to John the son of Zechariah in the wilderness.
He went into all the region around the Jordan, preaching a baptism of repentance for the remission of sins,
as it is written in the book of the words of Isaiah the prophet,
Every valley will be filled,
And all flesh will see the salvation of God.’ ”
John said to the crowds that were coming out to be baptized by him, “You brood of vipers, who warned you to flee from the coming wrath?
Produce fruit consistent with repentance, and do not begin to say to yourselves, ‘We have Abraham as our father,’ for I tell you that God is able from these stones to raise up children to Abraham.
Even now the axe is laid at the root of the trees. Every tree therefore that does not produce good fruit is cut down and thrown into the fire.”
So the crowds asked him, “What then should we do?”
John answered them, “Whoever has two tunics must share with him who has none, and whoever has food must do likewise.”
Some tax collectors also came to be 3:12 baptized ¦ baptized by him PCKbaptized, and they said to him, “Teacher, what should we do?”
He said to them, “Collect no more than what you have been authorized to collect.”

Then some soldiers asked him, “And what should we do?” He said to them, “Do not extort money from anyone by 3:14 threats or false accusations ¦ false accusations or threats ANTthreats or false accusations, and be content with your wages.”
Now as the people were waiting in expectation and were all questioning in their hearts whether John might be the Christ,
John answered them all, “I baptize you with water, but one is coming who is mightier than I, the strap of whose sandals I am not worthy to untie; he will baptize you with the Holy Spirit and fire.

His winnowing fork is in his 3:17 hand, and he will thoroughly clean out his threshing floor and ¦ hand to thoroughly clean out his threshing floor and to CThand, and he will thoroughly clean out his threshing floor and gather the wheat into his barn, but the chaff he will burn up with unquenchable fire.”
With these and many other exhortations John preached good news to the people.
But when John rebuked Herod the tetrarch because of his marriage to Herodias, his 3:19 brother's ¦ brother Philip's TRbrother's wife, and because of all the evils that he had done,
Herod added this to everything else: He locked up John in prison.
Now when all the people were baptized, and when Jesus had also been baptized and was praying, the heavens were opened,
and the Holy Spirit descended on him in bodily form like a dove. Then a voice came from 3:22 heaven, saying, ¦ heaven: CTheaven, saying, “Yoʋ are my beloved Son; in yoʋ I am well pleased.”
Jesus was about thirty years of age when he began his ministry, being the son (so it was thought) of Joseph, the son of 3:23 Heli ¦ Eli NA PCK SBL ST THHeli,
the son of 3:24 Matthat ¦ Matthan ANT PCK ¦ Maththat NA SBLMatthat, the son of Levi, the son of Melchi, the son of 3:24 Janna ¦ Joanna ANT ¦ Jannai CTJanna, the son of Joseph,
the son of Mattathias, the son of Amos, the son of Nahum, the son of 3:25 Esli ¦ Eslim ANTEsli, the son of Naggai,

the son of Maath, the son of Mattathias, the son of 3:26 Semei ¦ Semeei BYZ HF ¦ Semeu ANT ¦ Semein NA SBL ¦ Semeein TH WHSemei, the son of 3:26 Joseph ¦ Josech ANT CTJoseph, the son of 3:26 Judah ¦ Joda ANT CTJudah,
the son of 3:27 Joanan ¦ Joanna BYZ TR ¦ Joannan ANT PCKJoanan, the son of Rhesa, the son of Zerubbabel, the son of Shealtiel, the son of Neri,
the son of Melchi, the son of Addi, the son of Cosam, the son of 3:28 Elmodam ¦ Elmadam CTElmodam, the son of Er,
the son of 3:29 Jose ¦ Joshua CTJose, the son of Eliezer, the son of Jorim, the son of 3:29 Matthat ¦ Maththat CTMatthat, the son of Levi,
the son of Simeon, the son of Judah, the son of Joseph, the son of 3:30 Jonan ¦ Jonam CT PCK ¦ Jona ANTJonan, the son of Eliakim,
the son of Melea, the son of 3:31 Mainan ¦ Menam SCR ¦ Menna CTMainan, the son of Mattatha, the son of Nathan, the son of David,
the son of Jesse, the son of Obed, the son of Boaz, the son of 3:32 Salmon ¦ Sala CTSalmon, the son of Nahshon,

the son of 3:33 Amminadab, ¦ Amminadab, the son of Admin, NA SBL TH ¦ Admin, WHAmminadab, the son of 3:33 Ram, ¦ Ram, the son of Joram, ANT BYZ HF PCK ¦ Arni, CTRam, the son of Hezron, the son of Perez, the son of Judah,
the son of Jacob, the son of Isaac, the son of Abraham, the son of Terah, the son of Nahor,
the son of Serug, the son of Reu, the son of Peleg, the son of Eber, the son of Shelah,
the son of Cainan, the son of Arphaxad, the son of Shem, the son of Noah, the son of Lamech,
the son of Methuselah, the son of Enoch, the son of Jared, the son of Mahalaleel, the son of Cainan,
the son of Enosh, the son of Seth, the son of Adam, the son of God.
